assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: J.N. received funding from AstraZeneca for breast and ovarian cancer research. The remaining authors have no conflict of interest to declare.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The research was approved by the SingHealth Centralised Institutional Review Board (CIRB number is 2011/826/B) and was performed in accordance with the Helsinki Declaration of 1975, as revised in 2000. Written informed consent for research was obtained from both patients.
